casebody.data:
STAMFORD HOSPITAL
v.
Chaim SCHWARTZ et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 26, 2019 Chaim Schwartz, self-represented, and Rena Gelb, self-represented, in support of the petition.

The petition by the defendants Chaim Schwartz and Rena Gelb for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 190 Conn. App. 63 , 209 A.3d 1243 (2019), is denied.
